titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: MOTHER CURRENT SMOKER AT BOOKING INDICATOR - Description

div.p: An indication of whether the mother is a current smoker at booking.
MOTHER CURRENT SMOKER AT BOOKING INDICATOR is derived from SMOKING STATUS FOR MATERNITY.

Where SMOKING STATUS FOR MATERNITY National Code 'Current smoker' is recorded, MOTHER CURRENT SMOKER AT BOOKING INDICATOR should be derived as National Code 'Current smoker at booking'. Where any other National Code for SMOKING STATUS FOR MATERNITY is recorded, MOTHER CURRENT SMOKER AT BOOKING INDICATOR should be derived as 'Not a current smoker at booking'.
